body.name: Family Tree of Life Birthstone Necklace Jewelry with Kids Names - Christmas, Valentines, Anniversary Gift for Wife, Gift for Mom from Kids, Personalized Gift for Grandma from Grandkids [TPCSwOV]
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 22. Order within 16 hrs 24 mins.
features: Customization Options: Options include 925 Sterling Silver Birtshtones and Parts and 18K Vermeil Gold Birthstones/14K Gold Filled Parts, Half Prong Set 9mm x 13mm Teardrop Birthstones for every month, Satellite or Cable Chain options, Name or Initial Engraving on 11m x 6mm Oval Charms, and Clasp Options.

Handmade in our Boston studio: This unique family birthstone cascade necklace for mom is designed and handcrafted in our sunny studio in Massachusetts. Crafted with care, each necklace is a unique colorful cascade representing your family and can vary in color combination and names, no two ever the same!

Great gift idea for Mom: This high-quality PERSONALIZED birtshtone and name necklace for mom will cover every gift-giving occasion including Birthdays, Anniversaries, Mother’s Day, Christmas, Push Presents, or Baby Showers.
Future Additions Available: Necklace can be customized in the future to accomodate new birthstones/names for a growing family

productInformation.name: Best Sellers Rank
productInformation.value: #1,580 in Handmade Products (See Top 100 in Handmade Products) #63 in Handmade Pendant Necklaces

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: The Perfect Gift for Mom The Perfect V-Day Gift for Her! Our stunning cascade necklace can feature bright, colorful gemstones and engraved metal tags with names or nicknames, initials, or dates! This is the perfect piece to show off the names of your children, pets, siblings, besties, or anyone who is important to you. A Family Tree Twist This elegant take on a family tree necklace features engraved oval name tags corresponding to each person's birthstones. This is a true family classic! Beautiful Birthstones Using a combination of natural stones, colored quartz and chalcedony stones, you can be sure to represent everyone in your family. Grow with Your Family These necklaces can grow over time as your family gains new additions!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very pretty and fast delivery.
reviews.reviewText: Ordered this for my mother with 7 stones and initials for her grandbabies. We just found out a new baby is on the way so I ordered it late. It got here very fast considering it was customized. Very pretty and I love the alternate June birthstone.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 5, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I thought it was a nice piece. My wife is creative in her excuses not to wear it
reviews.reviewText: Very pretty, the gem stones are larger than what you'd think, looking at the picture. I thought it was a nice piece, for what it's worth.My wife and I have been married for 21 years, and I've never been able to buy a single piece of jewelry she has liked, ever, or rather to quote, "Honey, I'm just waiting for the right occasion/outfit to wear that piece to/with." To translate gentlemen, "My dear husband, as far as knowing my taste in jewelry, that will forever be a mystery to you dear. I'm not going to hurt your feelings, however please know that I don't own now, nor will I ever own, any outfit, nor will there be an event or occasion, beyond my funeral, that I will wear any jewelry you've picked out for me, on your own. Before you think, 'so you're saying there's a chance?' dear, statistically, the grim reaper is voting you out first, and I'll likely slip the jewelry in the coffin with you, because I love you too much to sell it, or give it away, but I'm certainly not wearing it. I love you, I know you tried, I appreciate the many thoughts over the 21 years, but honey, you're terrible at this. If you think you see some jewelry, that you know I'll love, let me stop you right there, it's a bad idea. I love you, that's why I keep these pieces that the only circumstance you could ever get me to wear them is post mortem. You better not, or I'll haunt you.."So. I thought it was a nice piece. Different strokes for different folks. I think Ugg boots are an atrocious looking set of footwear. Opposites attract.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very fast production time
reviews.reviewText: I got this as a gift for my sister for mother's day. It came very fast and was done exactly as I ordered. It is a very beautiful necklace and she loved it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Gorgeous and super fast delivery!
reviews.reviewText: I amazed by this company. I just placed my custom order two days ago for a necklace with 6 birthstones w/6 names and it was just delivered today! High quality and beautiful colors. Can’t wait to present it to my mom for Mother’s Day!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Mom loved it!
reviews.reviewText: It was very pretty a little on the cheap side but was still decent quality. Great mothers day gift.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Birthstone family necklace
reviews.reviewText: The wife absolutely loved it it was perfect in length. She is 5'9 and I got her the 24-in and it hung perfectly between her chesties

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 3, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The necklace was just as I had hoped it would be and my mother loves it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 13, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I love this necklace it's beautiful and I like having our names on it as well. I have gotten a few compliments on it
